src:
SC Estate Builder放眼太阳能新项目
01 Nov 2019, 07:59 by Nazuin Zulaikha Kamarulzaman
（吉隆坡破1日讯）SC Estate Builder Bhd与Dekad Aliran私人有限公司（DASB）签署一项谅解备忘录（MoU），拟议在工程、采购、建设与调试（EPCC）结构下开展太阳能业务合作。
SC Estate Builder今日向大马交易所报备，MoU旨在建立和确认公司与DASB之间的相互理解和意图，以便在未来10年内展开合作。
“双方应在MoU签订之日起的24个月内，或在双方一致同意的期限内，就联营合作事宜签订联营协议，进行排他性谈判。”
该公司指出，DASB设计、实施和支援太阳能发电系统，并参与太阳能购电协议和再生能源供应协议。
截至3时35分，该股扬0.5仙或16.67%，报3.5仙，交投量有211万9600股。
（编译：陈慧珊）

English version：
SC Estate Builder eyes new venture in solar power

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
SC Estate Builder looks at new solar projects
01 Nov 2019, 07:59 by Nazuin Zulaikha Kamarulzaman
(Kuala Lumpur, 1st) SC Estate Builder Bhd and Dekad Aliran Sdn Bhd (DASB) signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to develop solar business cooperation under the Engineering, Procurement, Construction and Commissioning (EPCC) structure.
SC Estate Builder reported to Bursa Malaysia today that MoU aims to establish and confirm mutual understanding and intent between the company and DASB in order to cooperate in the next 10 years.
"The parties shall sign a joint venture agreement on joint venture cooperation within 24 months from the date of signing the MoU or within the agreed time of both parties to conduct exclusive negotiations."
The company noted that DASB designs, implements and supports solar power systems and participates in solar power purchase agreements and renewable energy supply agreements.
As of 3:35, the stock rose 0.5 sen or 16.67% to 3.5 sen, and the trading volume was 2.19 million.
(Compile: Chen Huishan)

English version:
SC Estate Builder eyes new venture in solar power

Via theedgemarkets.com
